title: When will the Kayn stream gameplay video go back on?
body: Been a while since the technical issue stream and cancellation. Has it been cancelled for good or is it planned to be remade?

replies.body:
Ah man, lemme tell ya I was just as disappointed when that stream started messing up xD!

Originally they did plan on [**rescheduling that stream**](https://www.twitch.tv/leagueoflegends), but since it's been a little over a week since that was mentioned I'm not entirely sure if they'll do another Kayn stream or not =\ .
